about_the_game:
Step into the world of Sente, an electrifying battlefield where man and machine clash in an intellectual duel for supremacy, and where the future of strategy games awaits you.

INTENSE SIMULTANEOUS GAMEPLAY

Engage in an abstract strategy board game for 1 to 6 players that defies time and traditional gaming rules. Sente promises a heart-racing experience where each move triggers a ripple of outcomes, while the board continuously strives for equilibrium. 

This isn't just about taking turns – in Sente, all players' actions occur simultaneously, creating a nerve-wracking environment.

MASTER THE GRID

Plot your victory through the construction of intricate electrical networks. Disrupt your adversaries by obliterating their power lines, plunging them into darkness, or sparking a series of catastrophic explosions!

DYNAMIC ENVIRONMENT

The game board comes in different shapes and sizes, along with diverse starting setups, guaranteeing a unique experience every time you step into the arena.

THE TRUE TEST OF STRATEGY

Victory in Sente isn't about speed; it's about foresight.

It challenges you to predict your adversaries' simultaneous moves based on openly available information.

Sente offers not just a thrilling gaming experience, but a spectacle that's a treat to the eyes!

DISCOVER THE WORLD OF SENTE

Prove your worth as Jade Clark, a human who decides to challenge the robot AI at its own game. Climb the ranks of the Sente underworld, disguised as one of their own, and reclaim humanity’s pride from the machines.

FEATURES

  • Embark on electrifying matches for 1 to 6 players.

  • Challenge friends or find formidable opponents online.

  • Design your own battlefield with the Board Editor and experiment with new strategies.

  • Enjoy local multiplayer fun with your friends or square off against our AI.

  • Choose your style – enjoy thrilling Free4All or engage in strategic Team-based matches!

  • Relive your glorious victories with match replay and playback controls.

  • Customize your tokens with dazzling skins.

  • Play as our original protagonist to learn and master the underworld of Sente.

A TIMELESS CLASSIC

Dive into the future of board games. Sente – where strategy meets electricity, and every move can change your fate.

A timeless classic that promises to keep you hooked for ages.

Are you up for the challenge?
